name: Umbra (RAWEN)
description:
Umbra is a horror walking simulator where the player needs to find and gather a certain number of items that are placed around the map. When all items are gathered it unlocks a puzzle that is located at the central altar in the map - the player has to finish the puzzle in order to finish the game.

Note: the controls are a bit different from the tutorial page. There is no sprint option. You can jump by pressing "Space" and zoom camera with holding right mouse button. To interact with puzzle - use the arrow keys.

This is an early prototype just to test an idea for a game, so be ware - there are plenty of unresolved bugs and other issues. I hope you will enjoy playing it anyways and let me know what was your favorite part :)
